website_summaries.verdict: A terrific portable changing pad that offers a safe, supportive and comfortable surface for your baby.
pros: Features a built-in carry handle, adjustable shoulder strap, and wrist/stroller strap so you can carry the pad anywhere you go
Polyester and polyethylene foam pad is easy to wipe down
Includes two compact pockets for storing baby essentials and a large pocket for wipes
Comes with a small head pillow
cons: Can be tough to remove odors from the pad

customer_reviews.title: ... pad I have gotten and now it is my favorite. I purchased this to replace my skip hop
customer_reviews.text: This is the third diaper changing pad I have gotten and now it is my favorite. I purchased this to replace my skip hop. The skip hop one is much larger when folded with the same amount of diapers and wipes in it and the pad is about the same size. With the Comfy Cubs mat, I like that the Huggies soft wipe fits right into the wipe holder. Super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Izik

customer_reviews.title: I never write reviews but I’m so happy with this changing mat
customer_reviews.text: Okay... I never write reviews but I’m so happy with this changing mat. I love that I could attach it directly to my stroller. It makes it so convenient. Also the quality is the best!!! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Mikhnevich

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a baby shower gift so I have not personally used it but I think it is a very practical item. It is attractive and compact and is well made. It has zipper storage pockets plus a comfy built in pillow pad for the baby's head. This will make a great gift for any new parent. A handy strap lets you attach it to a stroller etc. so it is very convenient. A great item to carry at all times especially when traveling somewhere a changing area might not be available.
customer_reviews.author: SGR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect changing pad at half the price as similar ones at the store.  .
customer_reviews.text: My wife is expecting our second child, so I started ordering different items for my wife's diaper bag. I ordered this changing pad after seeing all the great reviews. Once the item arrived my wife inspected it, opened it up to see how big it expanded and she was very happy with the dimensions. The pad also matches her diaper bag, which she also loved. After receiving it and seeing how nice it was, I decided to order one to keep inside my diaper backpack. Some might be disappointed that it doesn't come with a wet wipe case, but that's not a big issue to us.
customer_reviews.author: Gori11a_White

customer_reviews.title: not at all easy to clean and the stitching is already coming apart ...
customer_reviews.text: not at all easy to clean and the stitching is already coming apart on mine. I've stopped using this altogether. the change pad is tiny and while this seems like a good idea its completely impractical for someone scrambling to change a poopy diaper. The pattern has already been scrubbed off too, this cant be washed in the washing machine so that's pretty much a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Person's Name

customer_reviews.title: Really convenient
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on Tuesday and it showed up at my door step the next day! I love how it is nice and sleek and always gives me a clean surface to lay my kids on when changing diapers. I have to carry a diaper bag around anyways, so having a bag that doubles as a changing mat just makes sense! It's perfect for when we go to the park, especially since I'm out a lot with TWO little ones, I don't need to get both over to a changing table, I can lay this right on the grass. This is great!
customer_reviews.author: fl

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof lining leaves baby lying down on pee
customer_reviews.text: I love the pockets and portable bag section. The zipper separating the changing mat from the rest of the bag allows us to use it at home and have it ready for a quick outing. The top fabric is very waterproof, which turned out to be a bad idea. Every other diaper change our baby boy will pee and since the lining is waterproof he ends up lying down on pee. Now we use liners instead of the mat. Still using the bag and pocket compartments because they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product has good potential however impractical for a mom who is juggling a baby in one hand trying to unclasp the changing clip with the other hand. The pouch for the diapers is too narrow and you can’t fit a larger package of wipes in the slot either. It’s convenient in the fact that it has 2 zipper pockets, and a handle. But the clasp is too difficult to undo, there are too many Velcro points that you have to undo. I prefer my skiphop changing pad, I purchased this one cause my original changing pad was lost.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Gil

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell but works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great but mine came with an odd smell- kind of like fish skin. I’ve had it a couple weeks now and it hasn’t gotten better with time. The smell is noticeable when I open the diaper bag too. I won’t bother returning it as in otherwise happy with it but that is a bit annoying. Works great for my 14mo old, I just wish I’d gotten it sooner. I also wish the flap for the wipes had a slot to pull them through, so you don’t have to pull the package out every time. Not a huge deal though. The strap to clip it on to a stroller is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good pad but not “easy to wipe down” as claimed
customer_reviews.text: Good pad but poop stains remained on pad after wiping. Poop accidents do not come off easily, even when wiped up immediately. Doesn’t seem waterproof. It’s as if the pee soaks through and gets into the inner foam. I machine washed it just in case which removed the stains.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Smith

customer_reviews.title: Happy I found this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this changing pad! It has a really soft pad for my baby's head -- that I haven't seen before. It's compact and has a lot of compartments that holds my essentials and looks like it's good quality. I have been looking for something that I could use to carry what I need for the baby and for myself -- when I leave the house --and be able to change my baby without lugging the huge diaper bag. I'm very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Char1820

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for when you don’t have a changing table
customer_reviews.text: I’m super happy with this purchase. We live in a really small apartment and didn’t have room for a changing table and also didn’t want to change the baby directly on the couch due to potential messes. This works great! The changing pad part unzips from the rest of it and We sanitize it regularly and fold it right up in her diaper box between uses. When we go out, we just zip it back together to the main part and stick it in the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: bri plessner

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously one of my favorite baby items, I've now gotten one for a friend too and will definitely be a go to for future baby shower gifts! It's easy to switch bags with or you can take it as is, pocket for wipes, diapers and an extra outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Lobert

customer_reviews.title: The best!! A life saver, especially when traveling
customer_reviews.text: I love this set!! Diapers, wipes, and everything you need fits so nicely and makes it so much easier than searching through my diaper bag. I love the design, very good quality! My daughter made an explosive poop in the car, and we cleaned her up in minutes in the back seat with this pad and set ready to go and she was so comfortable and happy. It makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Aden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Carrying the large diaper bag in and out of stores can be cumbersome. This is the perfect size to hold a couple of diapers, wipes, ointment and a small change of clothes. I do not like laying the baby on the changing tables in public restrooms. This small travel bag has an attached changing pad that works perfectly for that quick change. I leave the full diaper bag in the car with all of the essentials and just carry this one into the store. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great product for emergencies or day trips
customer_reviews.text: Has a lot of pockets but was hoping that I could fit a larger pack of wipes in this. Overall it's a very versatile baby tool to have. Just go into it with the right expectations that this is more for day trips rather than full on vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley O. Asbury

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It is high quality and it is big enough to actually fit a baby without any limbs hanging over. It is also very water/stain proof which is a plus :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: As new parents we are learning as we go. On our first outing I found myself going through our diaper bag looking for everything needed to change our son’s diaper, I quickly realized I needed a quick efficient way to organize diaper changes. This product offered just that.
customer_reviews.author: BargainBuy

customer_reviews.title: Germs on my baby???!!! No way!
customer_reviews.text: I use it when i hangout with my little one of course. And of course my 5months old baby pees and poops. Public restrooms are not clean as the one at my home. Some changing stations are even worse. However, after going through it all, all you can do is SPOT CLEAN????? Seriously?! Definitely on my never again list!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marylicious

customer_reviews.title: Hard to remove odors
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great. It folds up to a nice size and has a pillow area built in. My only issue is that if anything gets on the mat (whether you don't get a diaper on quick enough or what), the smell is almost impossible to remove. We've washed it, used different cleaners, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T

customer_reviews.title: Excited to have this in my bag!
customer_reviews.text: Received this in anticipation of the arrival of my second child. It's very nice quality, and looks like it should be much easier to take with me than the ginormous diaper bag I haul around. This will fit nicely in the bag and be easy to pull out and go when needed. Looking forward to using it!
customer_reviews.author: orgfish

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product to help us when we are babysitting our grandson. Very practical and it's portability makes it a great aid for our babysitting time.
customer_reviews.author: Carl F. Lo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Diaper Changes!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the perfect portable changing pad! It has pockets for diapers and wipes, is easy to fold/unfold, and fits nicely in our diaper bag. We have used it at other houses, sporting events, and in the car. It's very easy to wipe clean as well, and you have the option to unzip and remove the part that holds the diapers and wipes if you just want the portion where you would lay the baby on to change.
customer_reviews.author: H_Stoor

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe Changing Pad - Could be too large for some
customer_reviews.text: This is a deluxe changing pad. It has several pockets, is large in size, and even has some cushion to act as a pillow for the baby. The only thing i would like to note is that this changing pad (although portable) is larger than a typical portable changing pad. I got a pretty compact diaper backpack, so it will take up a good bit of the space in there. Just something to consider before buying. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: kinza s shekhani

customer_reviews.title: Ripped within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because of great reviews. Perhaps mine was just a bad one. Used it for 12 days after baby was born and found a tear. I'm only using it at home with our newborn so it's not had heavy use. Easy to clean. I like that it has a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable changing pad for my LO. the colour is nice and the material is water resistant- very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is bigger than I thought which I love. It means she’ll fit perfectly as she grows. There’s a section where you can unzip the changing pad part when you just want the section with wipes and a couple of diapers. Haven’t tried to place it on my stroller but it looks like it’ll hang on just fine!
customer_reviews.author: geneva

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to appreciate anything positive about this changing pad as it has the most horrendous smell. I’ve attempted to wipe it off and air it out. The smell actually has gotten worse. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing pad. It's nice having pockets for diapers and wipes and everything fold up together easily. Works well with my daughter too, padding is very nice on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for toddlers too
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use when I was venturing out on quick outings with my grandson, who's two. Now that he's older, it's more convenient to grab this and go versus his larger (bulky) diaper bag. I'm able to fit about 4 diapers and a small package of wipes inside and it still folds neatly together. Love the pattern and style.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH SCHEELK

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient and well made
customer_reviews.text: I am still pregnant so i haven't psychically used this yet but i messed with it and it seems to be very well made. It doesnt feel cheap. It is very convenient for when your out and about and need to change the baby. Conveniently holds diapers, wipes and a few other nessacarry items for changing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kegley

customer_reviews.title: Gift from Registry
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great. Bought as a gift for next month so cannot comment on durability. Fast service.
customer_reviews.author: GoGo Girl

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Leaving the House with a Baby
customer_reviews.text: We have used this since we have left the hospital with our little one. Perfect for changing diapers in the car! We take it everywhere with us. Love that it has storage to hold diapers, wipes, and you can clip on the diaper disposal bag holder. With the size of it, I know we will be using it as long as we are using diapers.
customer_reviews.author: AEB

customer_reviews.title: Functional and cute.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very functional with the flat part baby lays on and all the pouches/pockets. Love the idea that the pocket part can be detached. It is a little bulky though and will take up a lot of room in your diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: My daughter peed on it the first time I used it. We spot cleaned it the best we could and stored it back in the diaper bag. When we got home and took it out IT REEKED. So we looked at the instructions, spot clean ONLY. Seriously? A diaper changing pad that absorbs the pee but you can wash? I threw it in a gentle wash anyway to see if I could save it. Sure enough it’s now lumpy and ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Christina sparks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, a must have
customer_reviews.text: Great space for diapers and wipers. Easy to clean, portable and excellent when travelling.
customer_reviews.author: J. P

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and convenient!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the compactness of this changing pad. It holds everything you need! Without the bulk of a diaper bag. Bought one for both of our daughters!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Taber

customer_reviews.title: Material not so great
customer_reviews.text: Though the product has utility and serves the purpose, the quality of the material does not look great , will not recommend for soft on baby skin
customer_reviews.author: Debanjana Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to have in the car for my granddaughter. Works great for having diaper changes on the go. It also came in handy on vacation when the whole diaper bag wasn't needed.
customer_reviews.author: L H Banes

customer_reviews.title: Stinky when cleaned!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, so far durable,but smells like rotten fish when rinsed or diaper wiped off. Ew. The smell goes away once it's dry but p u
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Nice and convenient bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, looks easy to clean, lots of pockets. Exactly what I was looking for and will hook to a stroller
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Small enough when folded and large enough when using
customer_reviews.text: Like that it is small when folded and is large enough when unfolded. Like the slots for the extra diapers etc..
customer_reviews.author: Honeybear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a young baby.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift I gave a young mom and I saw her use it several times. It was very convenient and helpful with a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! This product is great for when a diaper bag is just not necessary. It can hold diapers and wipes and is light weight. It has a strap that can be worn on the wrist or attached to a stroller handle. I gave it 4 stars because it is on the large side so if your like me and keep it in the diaper bag as a backup, it takes up alot of space.
customer_reviews.author: rory walsh

customer_reviews.title: Changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice it’s was gift we haven’t had our baby boy yet
customer_reviews.author: Juliet M. Montes

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: Decent sized pockets for wipes/diapers. Has a clip to strap onto stroller or diaper bag. I think if the buckle used to close it was a magnet it would be quicker and easier to close and stow.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Cute design. One flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Giving four stars because was under the impression it’s waterproof. I have another brand and the changing part is more vinyl where it’s easy to wipe off. This one seems more cloth like where it could stain and seep tbrough.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha Martin

customer_reviews.title: Potable diaper change
customer_reviews.text: For a baby shower, if your just running out for a quick think you dont have to tote the diaper bag, add wipes a diaper and you have a pad, cuz you never know if its been clean where you need to change baby
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Portable, easy to clean, right size. I am sure my mother to be is going to love it. It is a baby shower gift that will be held on 5/30/20.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Baby gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a baby shower gift. It was fast shipment. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Well-made product
customer_reviews.text: Good materials. Big enough to hold several diapers and wipes, while small enough to be very convenient. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: With my second kid, we needed a portable Changing pad since the changing table was in my older son's room. This was the perfect solution. It is easy to clean and easy to use. We keep diapers and wipes in it so we just need this small pad wherever we are in the house. It is a great asset to parents who are not stationed next to the changing table all day.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Michele Johnson

customer_reviews.title: BEST changing pad!!!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Earlier this year I purchased the gray changing pad and I love it so much!!! Everyone kept asking where I purchased it from because it conveniently attaches to the stroller. Also, it’s very easy to change my babies diapers using this portable changing pad as everything is neatly packed. I’m so happy with the product that I’ve purchased this universal black changing pad for a friend. She will thank me later :)
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Mikhnevich

customer_reviews.title: Baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a baby shower gift. It looks very durable, large and easy to clean. I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Steigele

customer_reviews.title: changing pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift. The shower is not until August so I haven't opened it entirely but this was on her register.
customer_reviews.author: ConnieR

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: I like that there are compartments that an extra outfit, keys, couple of diapers, and wipes can go in. Great to take into store or with stroller instead of a diaper bag. I’ll be using this a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love how when I need to change ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Love how when I need to change my baby anywhere I have everything I need in one bag. Makes changing smooth and easy. With a quick wipe the changing pad is clean and ready to be used again. So glad I found this product!
customer_reviews.author: SavtaBub

customer_reviews.title: Great product, perfect for my boys.
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be perfect for my two boys when I don’t want to carry the entire diaper bag. There’s plenary of space in the pockets for a few diapers, wipes and butt paste if needed. Love that it comes in an easy to clean material and has nice padding for changing on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Marie Loper

customer_reviews.title: Compartments
customer_reviews.text: I love this! All the compartments are so helpful! The little pad for the babies head is great too especially since most changing areas aren’t exactly high quality! Love it definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect, on the go changing pad! It has room to put in a couple of diapers and a pack of wipes. I take it with me on small walks or in law's visits instead of taking with me the entire diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michal T.

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is great! The changing mat that came with my diaper bag was super flimsy and this one is sturdy and more comfortable. Plus the added storage and the strap to hang it from the stroller make it super convenient! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Jane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a new baby or expecting mom to be
customer_reviews.author: april williford

customer_reviews.title: Love the large size and compartments!
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing pad! It's great to bring along with me anywhere with my 1 & 2 year old toddlers. So many public places these days have no designated changing area for kids, so this changing pad really helps make life easier. It has compartments for everything you need to change a diaper, and it's large enough to make sure your baby or toddler has enough coverage without having to touch any other surfaces, especially in public places or when outside. Great idea and product!
customer_reviews.author: Xenia

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS!
customer_reviews.text: This product looks durable, easy to clean, and would be an item I would certainly find use in. However, mine arrived smelling like rotten fish. I couldn’t use it without my whole diaper bag reeking if a fish market.
customer_reviews.author: khmphry

customer_reviews.title: Baby Portable Changing Pad,
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as stated. Given as a shower present under Amazon as registered.
customer_reviews.author: h20color

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great for changing baby. Spacious and easy to clean. Folds nicely to fit into diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Eric Le

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger and better than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I've had a number of changing pads for my son. Some that came with fancy diaper bags and some that i bought separately as my emergency changing kit. None though are as big and sturdy feeling as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya E

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A good quality product. Lightweight and portable. Love that it can be zipped on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bulky and the material almost seems to soak up my baby’s pee
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: was a great price and seems perfect. Will try out when the new little one gets here soon!
customer_reviews.author: Heather A Shevchik

customer_reviews.title: Love it! So perfect for every Mom!
customer_reviews.text: Great trendy portable changing pad. Love that there are multiple pockets for all the little necessities. It's nice to be able to take just 1 conveniently sized pad when leaving the house instead of my whole diaper bag. The hand/stroller strap is a great bonus!
customer_reviews.author: raizel

customer_reviews.title: Great lightning deal buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality changing station. Holds everything I need and then some. Four size 2 diapers, Oxo travel wipes container and another zippered pocket in the front to hold small misc items. I like this a lot, closes nice and not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Mannys

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my husband's car because he is forgetful. As expected this has saved him many times while out and about.
customer_reviews.author: ariana tweedie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a baby gift and we love it
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item. I like the storage spaces for wipes and diapers, very handy. This changing pad folds up into chic, very lightweight, little ‘briefcase’.
customer_reviews.author: Delia W.

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect sized changing pad to carry around
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited to give this product to my friend for her new baby. It is the perfect sized changing pad to carry around, looks modern and is very practical. Always looking for practical and stylish gifts to give new moms, and this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: We dont go out without it
customer_reviews.text: Holds upto 5 diapers (4 comfortably), wipes, 4-5 disposable mats, diaper cream. I love that its padded so its comfortable for lil one. I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Tarun B.

customer_reviews.title: Good changing mat
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the changing mat but the pockets are very tight and can’t fit much
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Compact. Simple.  Effective.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a more on the go option. Didn’t want to have to lug the whole diaper bag all the time. Compact, fits just what’s needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Big
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect except it is huge! Will not fit into my backpack style diaper bag very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Changing Pad!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for when you're on the go. Fits easily into the diaper bag and is very convenient and easy to use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sky R.

customer_reviews.title: Great little changing station
customer_reviews.text: Great little changing station. Love that there are multiple pockets for all the little necessities. It's nice to be able to take just 1 little pouch into the bathroom for changes instead of my whole diaper bag. That way nothing has to ever touch the floor and/or I don't have to play the balancing game trying to keep everything off the floor while reaching in for diapers and wipes. Highly Recommended for all Mothers!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sakhrani

customer_reviews.title: Great prodcut
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I enjoyed receiving this product. It will make it easier for us to pack diapers and change the baby. There were no problems with delivery and we received this item in a very quick and timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high quality changing pad. It's lightweight and very convenient. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Izik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love it. Thanks for this product. I do recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jahaira A.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product, gets a little bulky with cloth diapers but stores what. I need.
customer_reviews.author: Ginelle Lara

customer_reviews.title: nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift. the recipient really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for on the go and I don't want the entire diaper bag. I personally keep a onsie in here too for blowouts!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, very portable!
customer_reviews.text: We were searching for something easy and portable to take into restrooms without the hassle of carrying the whole diaper bag. This is perfect for changing in public restrooms, at outdoor events, in the stroller and on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: This is a gift and my daughter has one and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift and my daughter has one and loves it. She used it all the time for my grandson. I am impressed with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Frey

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a future Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: This was on Baby Shower Gift registry for future granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: LAL

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell....
customer_reviews.text: This thing has the most awful smell. I've tried cleaning it and it still smells awful. Idk if it's the material used to make it or what...
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I ordered it because I can't believe how many public places don't have changing stations. It saves us for sure. I would recommend it to all my mom friends
customer_reviews.author: Drod4

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought for a gift for our granddaughter. I am sure that she is pleased with it otherwise she would have told us. She had many items on the registry so we picked several items.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Great design, perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't sure how the design would look but once it came I really love it and the combination of the two prints go perfectly! The color scheme is really classy. My baby is 22lbs and still fits. This is an amazing prduct if you're on the go parents. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: chena

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Trendy, but hard to put much in it. Only good to hold 2 diapers and some wipes or it’s too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's handy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend's baby shower. I wish that I had one of these pads when my children were infants. It is a compact clean surface for changing that would be perfect for parents on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for someone like my who doesn’t want to lug around a diaper bag. I’m a nursing mom so all I need is a few diapers and wipes. Is also big enough that I put an extra outfit in it for Just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The changing pad is large and easy to clean. Lots of pockets for diapers, wipes, ointments, and even a change of clothes. Pretty color and design (neutral for boy or girl). Plan on purchasing 3 more for friends that are expecting later in the year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Detachable pad
customer_reviews.text: Super large diaper changing pad. Love how it has plenty of zipper compartments to hold additional items. There is also a zipper that detaches the pad itself so you can wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

product_meta.title: Baby Portable Changing Pad, Diaper Bag, Travel Mat Station Grey Large
feature_bullets: Improve Baby Comfort & Hygiene – These portable changing mats provide a soft, supportive, clean space to change your baby’s diaper or clothes, or take a short nap.
Waterproof Changing Pad – The cushioned pad on the inside is lined with a safe polyester and polyerhelyne foam making it easy to wipe down if accidents happen.
Portable, Travel-Friendly – Each baby changing pad features a built-in carry handle, long, adjustable shoulder strap, and wrist/stroller strap for convenience.
Convenient Storage Pockets – Inside every changing mat you’ll find three compact pockets for storing baby essentials like diapers, wipes, pacifiers, and burp cloths.
Soft, Cushioned Pillow – Every portable baby mat also comes with a small head pillow to protect their head while you’re changing them for convenient support.
